title: Smart Data Models - GovSteamEU
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Simplified model  of boiler and steam turbine with PID governor.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovSteamEU

chc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Control valves rate closing limit (Chc).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = -3.3. Default: 0.0

cho.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Control valves rate opening limit (Cho).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 0.17. Default: 0.0

cic.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Intercept valves rate closing limit (Cic).  Typical Value = -2.2. Default: 0.0

cio.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Intercept valves rate opening limit (Cio).  Typical Value = 0.123. Default: 0.0

db1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Dead band of the frequency corrector (db1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

db2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Dead band of the speed governor (db2).  Typical Value = 0.0004. Default: 0.0

hhpmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum control valve position (Hhpmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

ke.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain of the power controller (Ke).  Typical Value = 0.65. Default: 0.0

kfcor.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain of the frequency corrector (Kfcor).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

khp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of total turbine output generated by HP part (Khp).  Typical Value = 0.277. Default: 0.0

klp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of total turbine output generated by HP part (Klp).  Typical Value = 0.723. Default: 0.0

kwcor.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain of the speed governor (Kwcor).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

mwbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Base for power values (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

pmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximal active power of the turbine (Pmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

prhmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum low pressure limit (Prhmax).  Typical Value = 1.4. Default: 0.0

simx.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Intercept valves transfer limit (Simx).  Typical Value = 0.425. Default: 0.0

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Boiler time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 100. Default: 0

tdp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Derivative time constant of the power controller (Tdp).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

ten.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Electro hydraulic transducer (Ten).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

tf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Frequency transducer time constant (Tf).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tfp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant of the power controller (Tfp).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

thp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. High pressure (HP) time constant of the turbine (Thp).  Typical Value = 0.31. Default: 0

tip.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Integral time constant of the power controller (Tip).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0

tlp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Low pressure(LP) time constant of the turbine (Tlp).  Typical Value = 0.45. Default: 0

tp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power transducer time constant (Tp).  Typical Value = 0.07. Default: 0

trh.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reheater  time constant of the turbine (Trh).  Typical Value = 8. Default: 0

tvhp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Control valves servo time constant (Tvhp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

tvip.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Intercept valves servo time constant (Tvip).  Typical Value = 0.15. Default: 0

tw.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Speed transducer time constant (Tw).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

wfmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Upper limit for frequency correction (Wfmax).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

wfmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lower limit for frequency correction (Wfmin).  Typical Value = -0.05. Default: 0.0

wmax1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Emergency speed control lower limit (wmax1).  Typical Value = 1.025. Default: 0.0

wmax2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Emergency speed control upper limit (wmax2).  Typical Value = 1.05. Default: 0.0

wwmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Upper limit for the speed governor (Wwmax).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

wwmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lower limit for the speed governor frequency correction (Wwmin).  Typical Value = -1. Default: 0.0
